snippet: In the battle for Allergan, too much focus on overly clever strategies. | Junk bonds gain favor in Europe. | Alibaba strikes a new deal with Alipay, its online payment affiliate. | A bond insurer objects to Detroit’s bankruptcy plan.
abstract: In the battle for Allergan, too much focus on overly clever strategies. | Junk bonds gain favor in Europe. | Alibaba strikes a new deal with Alipay, its online payment affiliate. | A bond insurer objects to Detroit’s bankruptcy plan.

headline.main: Morning Agenda: Overly Cute Moves in Allergan Fight
